definition: the area in which something exists or lives, surround so as to force to give up
details:
noun
- the area in which something exists or lives
= example: the area in which something exists or lives
= synonyms: environs
verb
- surround so as to force to give up
= synonyms: circumvent, besiege, beleaguer, hem in
- surround with a wall in order to fortify
= synonyms: fence
- extend on all sides of simultaneously
= synonyms: ring
- envelop completely
= synonyms: smother
